TopicTitle: Simple rocket I made thats capable of orbiting.

Articles.Content:
Here ya go:

Craft
why do you have a huge RCS tank with no RCS thrusters?

why do you have a huge RCS tank with no RCS thrusters?

I see some near the top of the orange fuel tanks.

Great stuff!... now you can swap that nosecone for a pod and send your first victims on a full orbit!... to save weight I recon you can swap that large rcs tank for a few small round tanks... and if you put a pod on you can use the smaller, lighter ASAS.

Keep up the good work, you'll be on Duna in no time!
